mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO historical_route ( id, city, deptid, speed, carid, blat, gpsflag, province, tName, carstatus, gaddress, lat, seq, direction, mileage, createtime, address, lng, summileage, glat, msgid, terminal, blng, glng, deptname, carnumber, district, gpstime, altitude ) VALUES
(#{it.id},#{it.city},#{it.deptid},#{it.speed},#{it.carid},#{it.blat},#{it.gpsflag}, #{it.province},#{it.tName},#{it.carstatus},#{it.gaddress},#{it.lat},#{it.seq},#{it.direction}, #{it.mileage},#{it.createtime},#{it.address},#{it.lng},#{it.summileage},#{it.glat},#{it.msgid}, #{it.terminal},#{it.blng},#{it.glng},#{it.deptname},#{it.carnumber},#{it.district},#{it.gpstime}, #{it.altitude})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM historical_route WHERE createtime BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and carnumber = #{name}
